name: Raghavendra Kanakagiri
content: Raghavendra Kanakagiri Raghavendra Kanakagiri I am an assistant professor in the Department of Computer Science and Engineering, IIT Tirupati. My research interests broadly encompass the field of high-performance computing. Prior to joining IIT Tirupati, I was a post-doctoral researcher at the University of Illinois Urbana-Champaign. I received my PhD from IIT Madras. Contact raghavendra[at]iittp.ac.in 114, Academic Block 1 Indian Institute of Technology Tirupati Yerpedu, Andhra Pradesh 517619 We have an open position for a project associate/JRF to work on sparse tensor computations. The JRF will have the potential to transition into a MS/PhD program. If you are interested, please drop me an email.
